name: Sunny Dives
description:
The full release of my submission to VimJam2: Boss Diver!

Outshine the competition in this competitive pool diving game!

Walk out onto diving boards! Jump off of them! Style on the competition with you shiniest poses! Impress stubborn judges!

Arcade Mode
Practice stringing together wicked dive combos, and earn some coins from the judges!

Challenge Mode
Face a  random challenger in a 3 round dive off, and earn even more coins! Watch out! You can lose coins too!

Poses
Spend your hard earned coin to unlock a variety of poses! The more poses you have unlocked, the more you can impress the judges!

Skins
Tired of the same old look? Drop some coins on a variety of challenger skins! Nothing stings more than defeating a challenger with their own outfit!
